review: Overall serviceis bad that being a reputed hospital,it treated an emergency patient unprofessionally who needed an immediate care and attention waited almost half a day.Waited a long for one hour,no assistance or wheelchair,seeing the patient in pain and completely distressed had to carry her in arms and taken to the emergency ward.And still they are least concerned about the well being and health of the person inspite the fact the doctors the told to admit her.
